Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2010 07:23PM JaniceRH wrote: Dear Bonnie; I'm glad I found your post; I've developed capsular contracture twice; I'm on my third exchange.  My PS is excellent and we're fighting this from taking ahold again.  I'm 3 1/2 weeks out, I still have my drain, I'm in PT 3 x a week and I see him once aweek, all for (some fairly painful) movements to keep a little ahead of the game.  I'm taking motrin 3 x a day as well as a strong dose of antibiotics...and I'm still getting some adhesions... I've posted here before about CC, but never received an answer really..I haven't talked to anyone who's had it twice before. This kind of sits in the back of my mind and I don't wan't to say..worried, anxious, or whatnot, but ..hmmm. Linda, you look beautiful in your pics.. Janice
Posts.Title: Wardrobe pics for boobless days mom2two ShadePink
